entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:46 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 06:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: N 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow changing to a few flurries overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
